subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Clint Dempsey and Landon Donovan were among 22 players selected Wednesday to the United States national men’s soccer team for its April 2 game against Mexico in Glendale, Ariz.
snippet: Clint Dempsey and Landon Donovan were among 22 players selected Wednesday to the United States national men’s soccer team for its April 2 game against Mexico in Glendale, Ariz.
